metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3736 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: BIND 9 resolver can crash when stale cache and stale answers are enabled,option `stale-answer-client-timeout` is set to a positive integer, and theresolver receives an RRSIG query. This issue affects BIND 9 versions9.16.12 through 9.16.36, 9.18.0 through 9.18.10, 9.19.0 through 9.19.8, and9.16.12-S1 through 9.16.36-S1.

criterions.comment: bind9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
